data.name: Legend of Krannia: Cursed Fate
data.detailed_description:
Update Notes

Legend of Krannia version 0.1.8 updates

Hello, Krannians!


We've already seen streamers who tried to play our game and we noticed one major issue: the current tutorial system is not effective and lacking.

We arrived to this conclusion since most people who streamed our game did not seem to apply the mechanics that has been shown in the beginning.

This does not mean the players are forgetful; this means that the current explanation of mechanics does not attract the player's attention. We also noticed that some core mechanics are not explained explicitly (players need to explore to find them out).

So, in this update, we tried to reworked the tutorial for Legend of Krannia.
The tutorials are now more interactive than the previous! We also tried to even out the tutorial to prevent cognitive overload.

With this update, we hope that players have more fun with experimenting with the different game mechanics of the game.

As always, we absolutely appreciate all the feedback that you have provided and please let us know if you encounter any issues in our discord channel.

Thank you for your continued support!

  • Mods
    • Reworked basic tutorial for movement, skills and stats
    • Added tutorial for card rarity, deck setup, deck leveling, skill cancellations and reaction skills
    • Changed description of life steal skills to reflect correct intervals


About the Game




Legend of Krannia is a Top-down Fantasy Medieval 2d Action Deckbuilding Game. Collect skills, Level up, Customize your Gameplay and Manage your stats. It has a Complex 2d Controls with skill switching, blocking and dodging.



Tons of Skills you can use to match your game strategy!

Game Features
  • Topdown 2d action Deckbuilding game
  • Complex 2d Controls with skill switching, blocking and dodging (with cancellations!)
  • Equip Skills, and Manage your stats
  • Collect skill, level up, customize your gameplay
  • Beautiful Levels
  • Unique and Interesting Bosses
  • Wacky Stories, Names


Community involvement and feedback from the players will be vital to the development process of Legend of Krannia. Join us!
